summary: A retexture for the Karliah Armor 2
descriptionHtml:
[color=orange] [size=8] [center]Karliah Armor 2
RETEXTURE [/size] [/color]

[color=red][size=5] UPDATE v2.5 is available now!! [/size] [/center] [/color]

[b][color=yellow] [u] Features: [/color][/u] [/b]
I retextured the Karliah Armor 2 cuirass to a brown, black and white leather look.
Maybe I also add the gloves/boots if I can figure out how to make a HQ texture,
like the cuirass is, because hagrid only made the cuirass.

[b][color=yellow] [u] Required Files: [/color][/u] [/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10386]Karliah Armor 2[/url] and its own requirements

[b][color=yellow] [u] Changelog: [/color][/u] [/b]
3.0 Added black boots and gloves (not available yet)
2.5 Added black/brown version
2.0 Added snow white version
1.5 Added raven black version
1.0 Initial release

[b][color=yellow] [u] INSTALLATION (NMM): [/color][/u] [/b]     <------RECOMMENDED OPTION
1. Download the mod with the NexusModManager
2. Activate it with it and overwrite if asked
3. Enjoy the game!

[b][color=yellow] [u] INSTALLATION (MANUALLY): [/color][/u] [/b] 
1. Download the mod manually to your PC
2. Extract the archive with any Compression tool (eg. Winrar, 7Zip..)
3. Drop the files in the DATA folder of your Skyrim directory and overwrite if asked
4. Enjoy the game!

[b] Please [color=red] COMMENT [/color] and [color=red] ENDORSE! [/color][/b]

[color=yellow][b][u]My Mods:[/u][/b][/color] [size=0.5](Click the images)[/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23900]Celes Lunari Follower[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23951]Nadine Temptress Marksman Trainer and Follower[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23639]Jasmin Lunari Race 1H Trainer Follower[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23469] [img]http://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTBuIeKoKH9jIptIO8_HCVGKCB1sR_rxIKp59maVOHrVR8ZMWTQww&t=1[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22816] [img] http://vagrantbard.files.wordpress.com/2011/05/fallout_3_icon.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22598] [img]http://images.all-free-download.com/images/graphiclarge/the_elder_scrolls_iv_oblivion_2_94817.jpg[/img][/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22351] [img]http://i.ytimg.com/vi/B4ImJOK1fBE/0.jpg[/img][/url]

I\'m NOT the CREATOR of the original mod, I just did a RETEXTURE
All rights go to Hentai, the creator of the original mod.
The original mod is found [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10386]here.[/url]
Also thanks to hagrid for the HQ retexture, which I\'ve used as [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21469]texture basement[/url]
author: DragonAge7
